name: Professor
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Professor has not used their ability: The Professor either shakes their head no or points to a dead player. If that dead player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

otherNights.description: Once per game at night*, choose a dead player: if Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
